data.actual_result: The button is clickable, but when you click it nothing happens because this is your original settings
data.expected_result: Reset notification settings button should not be clickable since these are your default settings
data.short_description: Editing notification settings for a channel and then putting it back to the default will give you an option to reset notification settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Click the channel name - Click notification settings  - Notice how reset notification settings button is not clickable. Change it to all messages instead of @mentions - Change it back to @mentions
